dnet_all

Public classess you will use:
  • DnetServer
  • DnetClient
Private classess you don't need to know about:
  • PeerQueue
  • FifoQueue


Comment:
By D's definition, char is "unsigned 8 bit". So char[] data or buffers are bytestreams, with char used as ubyte type.
